Scottish Agricultural Census

Introduction

Provides Scotland totals from the published results of the annual June Scottish Agricultural Census.

Scottish Agricultural Census: results

  • Scottish Agricultural Census: final results - June 2021

  • Scottish Agricultural Census: final results - June 2020

  • Scottish Agricultural Census: final results - June 2019

  • Scottish Agricultural Census: final results - June 2018

  • Scottish Agricultural Census: final results - June 2017

Total income from farming

Introduction

The official measure of the net income gained by the agriculture industry in Scotland.

Total income from farming: results

  • Total Income from Farming Estimates: 2018-2020

  • Total Income from Farming Estimates: 2017-2019

  • Total Income from Farming Estimates: 2016-2018

  • Total Income from Farming Estimates: 2015-2017

  • Total Income from Farming Estimates: 2014-2016

Scottish farm business income (FBI)

Introduction

Farm business level estimates of average incomes from commercial farms in Scotland.

Farm business income (FBI): annual estimates

  • Scottish farm business income: annual estimates 2021-2022

  • Scottish farm business income: annual estimates 2020-2021

  • Scottish farm business income: annual estimates 2019-2020

  • Scottish farm business income: annual estimates 2018-2019

  • Scottish farm business income: annual estimates 2017-2018
